name: Subaccount Viewer
description: Role for subaccount members with read-only authorizations for core commercialization operations, such as viewing subaccount entitlements, details of environment instances, and job results.

scopes.description: Get cloud management events on the local region
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.event.read

scopes.description: View all multitenant applications to which a subaccount can subscribe
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.subaccount.application.subscription.read

scopes.description: Get assigned entitlements for a subaccount
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.subaccount.entitlement.read

appDescription: Management of your environments and subscriptions to multitenant applications.

name: Subaccount Admin
description: Role for subaccount members with read-write authorizations for core commercialization operations, such as viewing subaccount entitlements, and creating and deleting environment instances.

scopes.description: Get cloud management events on the local region
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.event.read

scopes.description: View all multitenant applications to which a subaccount can subscribe
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.subaccount.application.subscription.read

scopes.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe to a multitenant application in a subaccount
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.subaccount.application.subscription.update

scopes.description: Get assigned entitlements for a subaccount
scopes.name: cis-local!b4.subaccount.entitlement.read

appDescription: Management of your environments and subscriptions to multitenant applications.

scopes.description: Write permission for XS roles and role collections
scopes.name: xs_authorization.write

name: User and Role Auditor
description: Read-only access for authorizations, trusted identity providers, and users.

scopes.description: Read permission for XS roles and role collections
